thread.title: Ed Sheeran reveals he's slept with some of Taylor Swift's squad
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran reveals he's slept with some of Taylor Swift's squad

author: Jennifer Crothers
title: Ed Sheeran reveals he's slept with some of Taylor Swift's squad
text:
Ed Sheeran reveals he's slept with some of Taylor Swift's squad The singer revealed he had a great time when he toured with his pal back in 2013 Share Ed revealed he'd had A Thing or two with some of Taylor's mates (Photo: WireImage) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Ed Sheeran has admitted being mates with Taylor Swift has surprise benefits - like when members of her 'squad' ended up in bed with. 
Loveable Ed , 26, says he couldn't believe his luck when he went on tour with Taylor from 2013-14, as the famous ladies were keen to get a piece of him. 
In a new interview with Rolling Stone , Ed, in typically low-key fashion, lifted the lid on his then prolific love life, which blossomed thanks to his Taylor's harem of female pals. Cute: Babe magnet Ed, Taylor and Selena Gomez at The Grammys (Photo: WireImage) Taylor Swift and Ed Sheeran, #ladontour (Photo: Getty) 
“Taylor’s world is celebrity,” he told the publication. 
“I was this 22 year old awkward British kid going on tour with the biggest artist in America, who has all these famous mates. 
“It was very easy. I would often find myself in situations just kind of waking up and looking over and being like, ‘How the f**k did that happen?” 
Ever the gentleman, self-deprecating Ed didn't name his conquests. 
Ed met Ellie Goulding during the Red Tour timeline, with her the rumoured subject of his song Don't. Self-deprecating Ed says he couldn't believe his luck (Photo: Instagram @taylorswift) Ed and his girlfriend Cherry are wonderfully cute (Photo: Splash News) Read More Ed Sheeran once hit Justin Bieber in the face with a GOLF CLUB and describes the 'sickening thud' 
And who else was in Taylor's squad at the time? She was mates in this period with Selena Gomez, Hailee Steinfeld, Lena Dunham, Lorde, Cara Delevinge, Lily Aldrige, Martha Hunt, Sarah Hyland, Jaime King, Dianna Agron from Glee and probably a lot more people that she didn’t Instagram so no-one's pointing any fingers at all. 
But Ed's currently loved up with his childhood friend and girlfriend of a year Cherry Seaborn , and his prolific dalliance days are well behind him. 
Ed told Radio 2 last month: "I spent every day for a year with this certain person, we kind of have a strong relationship now which is good. 
"I'm really secure now, we live together and we have cats, and I think when you have cats that's kind of it." Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
